thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com
thread.title: william mccann
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by william mccann

author: william mccann
title: william mccann
text: I have been an Eagle Optics customer for over 16 years. You will not find more knowledgeable nor helpful staff anywhere else. My first fog proof binoculars were the Eagle Rangers made in Japan at that time. They are still being used by me and my family. The Eagle Ranger binoculars feature focus ability for close objects Just purchased my second Pentax spotting scope using the Eagle website. Eagle Optics has earned my trust.
